name: Syrinscape Online Player
description:
Compatible with Roll20, D20Pro, Fantasy Grounds, or any virtual tabletop, the Syrinscape Online Player is a killer solution for routing your Syrinscape sounds with no latency and no loss of quality, creating immersion and engagement for your players.

With the Syrinscape Online Player, GMs can control Syrinscape in any browser and send sounds to an unlimited number of speakers, anywhere in the galaxy, in perfect sync and full-quality. The best news is that it is FREE for all our SuperSyrins, so subscribe today and be transported anywhere in the multiverse.
